Articles.Content:
For now, anyways. I've got way too much on my hands right now... I hope you understand.

You guys are the first community I've been in, the best one I've ever seen, and most likely the one I'll be in the longest.

I hope to be back either this summer or sometime next year, though sooner would be better, though unlikely. (Later is also possible, but that's an unpleasant thought.)

You might see me drop by every now and again, just don't expect me around every corner like I've been for a while.

I bid you farewell, may the flights be ever in your favor.

\*Lifts wing in salute\*
Oh, I'm sorry to see you go Starwhip, take care of yourself.

Farewell, Starwhip. I'm sure we'll see you in the future.

Happy landings!
Bye Starwhip. GL with you future endeavors.
See you in orbit man...
I'll be waiting on the flipside of the coin...
See ya later, get your stuff cleared up!

> 
> I hope to be back either this summer or sometime next year, though sooner would be better, though unlikely. (Later is also possible, but that's an unpleasant thought.)

Hey Starwhip! Are we still working on the Black-Eyed Peas parody? I don't want that to be cancelled... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

...but I completely understand. I've been going through a lot of stuff, too. Best of luck in your life, until we all see you again! And thanks for being an awesome member of the Forums.

-Upsilon

Farewell, Starwhip. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Hope you return soon.

No, not Starwhip! ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

You're an amazing guy, Starwhip! Seeing you rise up the ranks and becoming a beloved member of our community has been very amazing. Good luck in the future, we'll miss you! ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
See ya, Starwhip. We'll all be missing you. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
\*Salutes\* See you 'round, pal. Come back in one piece, alright?
Good bye and good luck. We'll keep a place set at the table until you return!
Goodbye, good luck and have fun!

> 
> Hey Starwhip! Are we still working on the Black-Eyed Peas parody? I don't want that to be cancelled... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
> ...but I completely understand. I've been going through a lot of stuff, too. Best of luck in your life, until we all see you again! And thanks for being an awesome member of the Forums.
> 
> -Upsilon

Ah, don't worry, I didn't make such great lyrics just to go throw them in the trash bin... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thanks, all. 

--Starwhip

Sorry to hear that you're leaving. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Are you still finishing the render requests? In any case, good luck with your stuff man, and I hope to see ya back here this summer!

![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Good luck with whatever you're facing Starwhip. You're a great member of the community, and I'm sure that we're all awaiting your return.
Thrust long thrust far Starwhip. \*Lifts wing\*
You've been a great member of the community. Good luck with your future endeavors.
It's been fun seeing you here Starwhip. Best of wishes. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

farewell. you have been a good deal of help, and also a good friend.

I look forward to seeing you again.

p.s. I just realized that your avatar was a dragon.
It's been a pleasure. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
You gotta come back for 1.0 release right?

Godspeed, Starwhip!

Take care and donÃ‚Â´t try exploding in RL. Be seeing you ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Jeez, guys, you make it sound like I'm leaving for good. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Don't worry, I'll be lurking about; I just won't be as prolific a poster as before.

> 
> p.s. I just realized that your avatar was a dragon.

\*sighs\* ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)
